alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Clinton; Platte (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 23 at 9:46AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Leavenworth, southeastern Atchison, Buchanan, west central Clinton and northern Platte Counties through 1015 AM CDT... At 946 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lewis And Clark Village, or 7 miles northwest of Weston, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Joseph, Atchison, Weston, Gower, Agency, Dearborn, Rushville, Lewis And Clark Village, De Kalb, Iatan, Faucett, Bean Lake, Lewis And Clark Vi and Lowemont. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 25 and 45. Interstate 229 between mile markers 0 and 2. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
